Summary: Multiple flashing strobe very bright no noise and the object hovered in one spot.
divs: Sighting DetailsThis is the 3rd object like this we have seen since November 2008. In November 2008 and 2x in January 2009. The object makes no noise it does NOT move much if at all. It is very bright, brighter than any star.... and has different color lights.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Easton
There were no other sightings in Easton on or around January 30th 2009
